message.name: INF_DISPLAY_TEXT_WHEN_ALTERNATE_NAME_MERGED
message.locale: An alternate name has been added for %1s.

message.name: INF_DISPLAY_TEXT_WHEN_ALTERNATE_ID_MERGED
message.locale: %1s has more than one alternateID.

message.name: INF_DISPLAY_TEXT_WHEN_PERSON_DETAILS_MERGED
message.locale: Updated the %1s's gender, marital status, nationality and country of birth.

message.name: INF_DISPLAY_TEXT_WHEN_ADDRESS_MERGED
message.locale: At least one additional postal address has been added for %1s.

message.name: INF_DISPLAY_TEXT_WHEN_PHONE_NUMBER_MERGED
message.locale: At least one additional phone number has been added for %1s.

message.name: INF_DISPLAY_TEXT_WHEN_GENDER_MERGED
message.locale: The gender of %1s has been updated.

message.name: INF_DISPLAY_TEXT_WHEN_MARTIAL_STATUS_MERGED
message.locale: The martial status of %1s has been updated.

message.name: INF_DISPLAY_TEXT_WHEN_NATIONALITY_MERGED
message.locale: The nationality of %1s has been updated.

message.name: INF_DISPLAY_TEXT_WHEN_COUNTRY_OF_BIRTH_MERGED
message.locale: The country of birth for %1s has been updated.

message.name: INF_DISPLAY_TEXT_WHEN_DATE_OF_BIRTH_NEED_MERGE
message.locale: The date of birth recorded on %1s differs from %2s's date of birth and cannot be merged.

message.name: ERR_SEARCH_CLIENT_ENTER_MIN_DATA
message.locale: User must input at least Reference, First Name and Date of Birth or Last Name.

message.name: INF_DISPLAY_NAME_MERGE_CONFIRMATION
message.locale: An alternate name record will be created on the registered person, %1s, with the name %2s as a result of the client merge.

message.name: INF_DISPLAY_CLIENT_MERGE_CONFIRMATION
message.locale: %1s will have more than one %2c

message.name: INF_DISPLAY_NATIONALITY_CONFIRMATION
message.locale: The nationality of %1s will be updated as a result of the client merge.

message.name: INF_DISPLAY_PERSON_CONFIRMATION
message.locale: The client merge will result in changes to %1s's gender, marital status, nationality and country or region of birth.

message.name: INF_DISPLAY_COUNTRY_CONFIRMATION
message.locale: The country or region of birth for %1s will be updated as a result of the client merge.

message.name: INF_DISPLAY_ADDRESS_CONFIRMATION
message.locale: At least one additional postal address will be created for %1s as a result of the client merge.

message.name: INF_DISPLAY_PHONE_CONFIRMATION
message.locale: At least one additional phone number will be created for %1s as a result of the client merge.

message.name: INF_DISPLAY_GENDER_CONFIRMATION
message.locale: The gender of %1s will be updated as a result of the client merge.

message.name: INF_DISPLAY_MARITAL_CONFIRMATION
message.locale: The marital status of %1s will be updated as a result of the client merge.

message.name: INF_DISPLAY_CONFIRMATION
message.locale: You have selected to match %1s (prospect person) with %2s (registered person).

message.name: INF_MATCH_CLIENT_COPY_EVIDENCE_PARTICIPANT_INFO
message.locale: About to copy evidence for participant: %1s to participant: %2s.

message.name: INF_MATCH_CLIENT_EVIDENCE_TYPE_INFO
message.locale: Processing Evidence of Type: %1c.
